1.name: The Federation of Sol
1.agentAbility: At the start of a ground combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ground force in the active system; that ground force rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.
1.commanderAbility: At the start of a ground combat on a planet you control: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.
1.commanderUnlock: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 resources.

2.name: The Mentak Coalition
2.agentAbility: After the faction ability is used against another player: You may exhaust this card; if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card.
2.commanderAbility: After you win a space combat: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.
2.commanderUnlock: Have 4 cruisers on the game board.

3.name: The Yin Brotherhood
3.agentAbility: After a player's destroyer or cruiser is destroyed: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place up to 2 fighters from their Reinforcements in that unit's system.
3.commanderAbility: This card satisfies a green technology prerequisite. You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost; these additional infantry do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

4.name: The Embers of Muaat
4.agentAbility: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may produce up to 2 units that each have a cost of 4 or less in a system that contains 1 of their war suns or their flagship.
4.commanderAbility: After you spend token from your strategy pool: You may gain 1 trade good.
4.heroAbility: After you move a war sun into a nonhome system other than Mecatol Rex: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

5.name: The Arborec
5.agentAbility: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with 1 from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship
5.commanderAbility: After another player activates a system that has 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: produce 1 unit in that system.
5.commanderUnlock: Have 12 ground forces on planets you control.

6.name: The Lizix Mindnet
6.agentAbility: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.
6.commanderAbility: Units that have PLANETARY SHIELD do not prevent you from using BOMBARDMENT.
6.commanderUnlock: Have 4 dreadnoughts on the game board.

7.name: The Winnu
7.agentAbility: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.
7.commanderAbility: During combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls in the Mecatol Rex system, your home system, and each system that contains a legendary planet.
7.commanderUnlock: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system.

8.name: The Nekro Virus
8.agentAbility: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their Rommand sheet to gain 2 trade goods.
8.commanderAbility: After you gain a technology: You may draw 1 action card.
8.commanderUnlock: Own 3 technologies. A Valefar Assimilator technology counts only if its X or Y token is on a technology.

9.name: The Naalu Collective
9.agentAbility: After an agenda is revealed: You may exhaust this card to look at the top card of the agenda deck. Then, you may show that card to 1 other player.
9.commanderAbility: You may produce 1 additional fighter for their cost; these additional units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.
9.commanderUnlock: Have 12 fighters on the game board.

10.name: The Barony of Letnev
10.agentAbility: At the start of a space combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system; that ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.
10.commanderAbility: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE: You may gain 1 trade good.

11.name: The Clan of Saar
11.agentAbility: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.
11.commanderAbility: When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded.
11.commanderUnlock: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

12.name: The Universities of Jol-Nar
12.agentAbility: When player spends resources to research: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove any number of their infantry from the game board. For each unit removed, reduce the resources spent by 1.
12.commanderAbility: After you roll dice for a unit ability: You may reroll any number of those dice.

13.name: Sardakk N'orr
13.agentAbility: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.
13.commanderAbility: During the Commit Ground Forces step: You can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

14.name: The Xxcha Kingdom
14.agentAbility: ACTION: Exhaust this card to ready any planet; if that planet is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control, you may remove 1 infantry from that planet and return it to its reinforcements.
14.commanderAbility: Each planet that you exhaust to cast votes provides additional vote. Game effects cannot prevent you from voting on an agenda.
14.commanderUnlock: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 influence.

15.name: The Yssaril Tribes
15.agentAbility: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.
15.commanderAbility: After another player activates a system that contains your units: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

16.name: The Emirates of Hacan
16.agentAbility: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.
16.commanderAbility: When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods. Cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

17.name: The Ghosts of Creuss
17.agentAbility: After a player activates a system that contains a non-delta wormhole: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole during this tactical action.
17.commanderAbility: After your ships move: For each ship that has a capacity value and moved through 1 or more wormholes, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements with that ship if you have unused capacity in the active system.
17.commanderUnlock: Have 3 units in 3 systems that contain alpha or beta wormholes.

52.name: The Mahact Gene-sorcerers
52.agentAbility: When you would spend a command token during the secondary ability of a strategic action: You may exhaust this card to remove 1 of the active player's command tokens from the board and use it instead.
52.commanderAbility: During your tactical actions, you can activate systems that contain your command tokens. If you do, return both command tokens to your reinforcements at the end of your turn.
52.commanderUnlock: Have 2 other factions' command tokens in your fleet pool.

53.name: The Nomad
agentAbility: When you gain trade goods from the supply: You may exhaust this card to place an equal number of trade goods on this card. When this card readies, gain the trade goods on this card.
At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove 2 of their ground forces from the game board and place them on planets they control in the active system.
After the Roll Dice step of combat: You may exhaust this card. If you do, hits are not assigned to either player's units. Return to the start of this combat round's Roll Dice step.
53.commanderAbility: You can produce your flagship without spending resources.

54.name: The Vuil'raith Cabal
54.agentAbility: After another player replenishes commodities: You may exhaust this card to convert their commodities to trade goods and capture 1 unit from their reinforcements that has a cost equal to or lower than their commodity value.
54.commanderAbility: When you produce fighter or infantry units: Up 2 of those units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

55.name: The Titans of Ul
55.agentAbility: When a hit is produced against a unit: You may exhaust this card to cancel that hit.
55.commanderAbility: When 1 or more of your units use: You may gain 1 trade good.
55.commanderUnlock: Have 5 structures on the game board.

56.name: The Empyrean
56.agentAbility: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets: You may exhaust this card; that player gains 1 command token.
56.commanderAbility: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 of your command tokens: You may return that token to your reinforcements.
56.commanderUnlock: Be neighbors with all other players.

57.name: The Naaz-Rokha Alliance
57.agentAbility: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to explore 1 of their planets.
57.commanderAbility: After you gain control of a planet that was controlled by another player: You may explore that planet.

58.name: The Argent Flight
58.agentAbility: When a player produces ground forces in a system: You may exhaust this card; that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.
58.commanderAbility: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: You may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.
58.commanderUnlock: Have 6 units that have ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, SPACE CANNON or BOMBARDMENT on the game board.
